TopicTitle: Good performance and good visual mods combination

Articles.Content:
I got into mods recently and I am just installing visual mods I am now using spectra+scatterer+EVE with scatterer water disabled Im asking what good mods you recommend for performance (I got a pretty bad pc) and astounding visuals.
My pc specs are CPU A6 7480 GPU Radeon RX 550 and RAM 8GB
